name: Ghost Package
description:
Game created for Weekly Game Jam #197.

Team:

  • Curricle (art)
  • Nils K (music)
  • VinceValence (me) (programming)

In this game, you play as a worker of a delivery company (like Amazon). You are in charge of closing the boxes, however, your kleptomaniac self cannot refrain from stealing the package´s items. Steal what you can while avoiding getting caught!
